item.title: Alibaba Rallies on New AI Chip Design, Sending NVIDIA Stock Lower
item.description: Alibaba has entered the AI chipmaking race, responding to NVIDIA pulling out of the market by not selling H20 cihps to China anymore.

item.title: Loop Industries Insiders Buy Stock, Signal Confidence in Outlook
item.description: Loop Industries insiders are buying this stock, signalling increased confidence in the outlook for commercializing its technology.

item.title: 3 High-Yield Stocks Just Supercharged Their Dividends
item.description: Three stocks with dividend yields multiples higher than the overall market just lifted their dividends by as much as 12%.
